author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Coronavirus: Trump says peak is passed and US to reopen soon
description: "We'll be the comeback kids," the president says, predicting some states will reopen this month.
content:
Media captionCoronavirus: Michigan residents protest governor's stay-at-home orders
President Donald Trump says the US has "passed the peak" of new Covid-19 cases and predicted some states would reopen this month.
At the daily White House virus briefing, Mr… [+1435 chars]
